hero.title: World-Class Women's Health Experts, *on-demand.*
hero.subtitle: Book Leading Women's Health Specialists - On Your Schedule.
hero.disclaimer: We connect you with independent, licensed health experts.
hero.cta1: Not sure if we can help? Take the Quiz

podcast.title: Elevating Women's Health with Patr√≠cia Mota, PT, PhD
podcast.subtitle: The podcast
podcast.description: Empower your health journey with "Elevating Women's Health" by Eleva Care. Our expert hosts break down cutting-edge research in women's health each week, translating complex studies into actionable insights. From reproductive wellness to mental health, we cover it all.

services.title: How we support you
services.subtitle: Expert-led care, tailored to you
services.description: Access personalized care from top women‚Äôs health professionals. We connect you with the expertise you need‚Äîfrom online consultations to local resources‚Äîdesigned around your unique journey.

items.title: Pregnancy & Postpartum
items.description: Compassionate, evidence-based support through pregnancy and early motherhood.
items: **Physical Therapy:** Prepare for birth, manage pain, regain strength, address diastasis recti, and receive targeted pelvic floor interventions to prevent and treat dysfunction.
**OB/GYN Care:** Receive expert care throughout your pregnancy journey and postpartum recovery.
**Nutritional Guidance:** Optimize your diet for a healthy pregnancy and postpartum journey.
**Mental Health Support:** Navigate the emotional and mental challenges of motherhood with compassionate guidance.
**Exercise:** Explore the benefits of therapeutic exercise during pregnancy and postpartum, designed to support your changing body and promote a healthy recovery.

items.title: Pelvic Health
items.description: Specialized care for pelvic floor health across every stage of life.
items: **Pelvic Physical Therapy:** Specialized treatment for incontinence, pelvic organ prolapse, and pelvic pain, including pain during intercourse.
**Specialized OB/GYN Care:** Expert diagnosis and treatment for a range of pelvic health issues, including prolapse, endometriosis, and sexual dysfunction.
**Mental Health Support:** Counseling and therapy to address the psychological aspects of pelvic health concerns.

items.title: Through Every Stage
items.description: Holistic support from adolescence through menopause‚Äîand beyond.
items: **Teen Health:** Navigate puberty, menstruation, and early womanhood with confidence and support.
**Menopause Management:** Address hormonal changes, manage symptoms, and prioritize your well-being
**Mental Wellness:** Access therapy and support to manage stress, anxiety, depression, and other mental health concerns.
**Fitness & Nutrition:** Discover personalized exercise plans and nutritional guidance tailored to your individual needs.
**Physical Therapy:** Manage pain, prevent injury, and optimize your physical performance, with specialized expertise in pelvic floor health for active women and female athletes.

items.title: Empowering Your Cancer Journey
items.description: Specialized support for breast and gynecologic cancers‚Äîfrom diagnosis to survivorship.
items: **Physical Therapy:** Optimize your recovery with pre-surgical preparation, post-treatment rehabilitation, lymphedema management, and targeted exercise programs designed for each phase of your cancer journey.
**Pain Management:** Access evidence-based techniques for managing treatment-related pain, including manual therapy, therapeutic exercise, and scar tissue management.
**Exercise Support:** Receive personalized exercise prescriptions that adapt to your treatment phase, helping maintain strength, manage fatigue, and support your recovery journey.
**Mental Health Care:** Navigate the emotional challenges of diagnosis and treatment with professional support focused on building resilience and managing anxiety.
**Lymphedema Care:** Benefit from specialized prevention strategies and treatment including manual lymphatic drainage, compression therapy, and self-management education.
**Collaborative Approach:** Our collaborative approach ensures coordinated care with your oncology team, supporting your physical and emotional well-being throughout treatment and recovery.
Our collaborative approach ensures coordinated care with your oncology team, supporting your physical and emotional well-being throughout treatment and recovery.

approach.title: At Eleva Care, we believe:
items: Every woman deserves access to **quality healthcare**.
**Knowledge is power** in healthcare decisions.
**Collaboration** leads to better health outcomes.
Women's health is a lifelong, **evolving journey**.
**Pelvic health** is essential to overall well-being.
approach.description: At Eleva Care, we believe in a collaborative approach to care. Our team of experts work together to provide you with comprehensive and personalized support, ensuring that every aspect of your health is addressed.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: Transforming women's health care through innovation and compassion
mission.description: At Eleva Care, we are dedicated to empowering women of all ages to take control of their health and well-being. Our mission is to provide a supportive and inclusive platform that connects individuals with expert-led resources, evidence-based information, and a collaborative community of care experts.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To bridge the gap between scientific research and practical application, delivering accessible and personalized women's health care solutions throughout every life stage.

beliefs.title: At Eleva Care, we believe:
items: Every woman deserves access to quality healthcare.
Knowledge is power in healthcare decisions.
Collaboration leads to better health outcomes.
Women's health is a lifelong, evolving journey.
Pelvic health is essential to overall well-being.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: Founded by passionate experts in women's health
team.description: Eleva Care is led by a team of dedicated professionals who bring together years of experience in women's health, technology, and expert-led care. Our founders and key team members are committed to revolutionizing the way women access and experience healthcare.

members.name: Patricia Mota, PT, PhD
members.quote: Our mission is to elevate women's healthcare by making it more accessible, innovative, and empowering for all women.

members.name: Cristine Homsi Jorge, PT, PhD
members.quote: Clinical research and education empower women to make informed decisions about their healthcare journey.

members.name: Alexandre Delgado, PT, PhD
members.quote: Evidence-based physical therapy transforms the pregnancy and birth experience, empowering women through every stage.

members.name: Patricia Driusso, PT, PhD
members.quote: Clinical research advances rehabilitation treatments while empowering women through evidence-based education.

members.name: Annelie Gutke, PT, PhD
members.quote: Understanding pain mechanisms transforms how we care for women during pregnancy and beyond.

members.name: Ruben Barakat, PhD
members.quote: Evidence shows that personalized exercise during pregnancy can transform women's health outcomes.

members.name: Jessica Margarido, PT
members.quote: Evidence-based rehabilitation restores function and quality of life throughout cancer care.

members.name: Joana Goul√£o Barros, MD, PhD
members.quote: Integrating medical expertise with specialized rehabilitation creates the highest standard of prenatal care.

members.name: Rodrigo Barona
members.quote: We are transforming women's healthcare by combining clinical expertise with innovative technology.

newsletter.title: Femme Focus
newsletter.subtitle: An Eleva Care Publication
newsletter.description: Your monthly spotlight on women's health insights, expert advice, and empowering stories to nurture every stage of your wellness journey.
newsletter.privacy: We respect your privacy. Unsubscribe at any time.

footer.tagline: Empowering women's health through expert care and innovation.

platformDisclaimer.title: We're a healthcare technology platform
platformDisclaimer.description: We help you connect with independent, licensed care experts. We provide the technology; your chosen expert provides your care.

experts.title: Independent Experts

experts.description: Find and book trusted experts specializing in physiotherapy and women's health. Our platform connects you with qualified care experts ready to support your unique health and wellness journey.
experts.topExpertDisclaimer: Experts on Eleva Care are independent professionals who self-certify their credentials.

platform.title: How Eleva Care works
platform.description: Eleva Care is a trusted platform that connects you with independent, licensed care experts. We don't provide medical services; your chosen expert provides your care.

cookie.message: We use cookies to enhance your experience, analyze site traffic, and for marketing purposes. By clicking "Accept", you consent to our use of cookies.

collision.title: Appointment Conflict - Refund Processed
collision.subject: Appointment Booking - Time Slot No Longer Available
collision.conflictMessage: We regret to inform you that your appointment with {expertName} scheduled for {appointmentDateTime} is no longer available as the time slot has been booked by another client.
collision.latePaymentExplanation: Since this was a delayed Multibanco payment, we have processed a refund of ‚Ç¨{refundAmount} (90% of the original amount, with 10% retained as a processing fee as outlined in our payment policies).
collision.apologyAndInvitation: We apologize for the inconvenience and invite you to book a new appointment at your convenience.
collision.minimumNoticeViolation: The appointment time no longer meets the expert's minimum notice requirement of {minimumNoticeHours} hours.

checkout.multibancoNotice: ‚ö†Ô∏è **Multibanco Payment Notice:** If you choose Multibanco as your payment method, your appointment slot will be reserved for 24 hours while we wait for payment confirmation. After 24 hours, if payment is not received, we cannot guarantee the appointment will still be available. For immediate confirmation, please use a credit/debit card. [View Payment Policies]({paymentPoliciesUrl})
checkout.termsOfService: By proceeding with payment, you agree to our [Terms of Service]({termsUrl}) and [Payment Policies]({paymentPoliciesUrl}).

email.bookingConfirmedText: Your booking has been confirmed and your appointment slot is reserved.
email.paymentInstructions: To complete your booking, please pay using Multibanco with the details below:
email.method1: 1. Online Banking: Log into your bank account and select "Payments" or "Multibanco"
email.method2: 2. ATM: Insert your card, select "Other Operations" ‚Üí "Payments" ‚Üí "Public Services"
email.method3: 3. Enter the Entity and Reference numbers above, confirm the amount
email.meetingAccessText: Once your payment is confirmed, you will receive another email with your meeting link and access details.
email.importantText: Your appointment slot is reserved for 7 days. If payment is not received by the expiry date above, your reservation will be cancelled.
email.questionsText: If you have any questions about your booking or payment, please contact our support team.

publishDialog.agreementIncludes: including professional conduct standards, liability terms, and platform obligations
publishDialog.disclaimer: By publishing your profile, you acknowledge that you are a licensed care expert and agree to comply with all applicable laws and regulations.

unpublishDialog.title: Unpublish Your Expert Profile
unpublishDialog.description: Unpublishing your profile will hide it from clients. You will not appear in search results and clients won't be able to book your services until you publish again.

incompleteDialog.title: Complete All Steps First
